# Reading in the Data

```

top50 <- read_csv("../data/top50cleaned.csv")

attach(top50)
```

# Variable Selection and Shrinkage for Song Popularity Prediction

```{r}
library(leaps)
```

This test focuses on variable selection for the response "Popularity." In other words, finding the most optimal regression function for the prediction of a song's popularity rating.

The predictors used are:   
- Genre: Categorical variable that creates dummy variables GenreLatin and GenrePop   
- Beats Per Minute  
- Energy
- Dancibilty  
- Loudness    
- Liveness  
- Valence  
- Length    
- Acousticness  
- Speechiness  

```{r}
reg.fit <- regsubsets(Popularity ~ . -X1 -Track.Name -Artist.Name -Popularity, 
           data = top50, nvmax = 11)

summary(reg.fit)
```
